pages.title: Herbology
pages.text: Many common plants are used in the preparation of $(item)brews$() and magicks, this book details those rare or exceptional plants not known to the common folk.
Deadly nightshade, so is this plant known, and deadly poisons from it grown. It grows in tilled earth in stages. Tall grass yields seeds.

A plant with a unique defense, when disturbed it bursts into flames. Harvest with shears. It can live anywhere, but spreads only on $(item)grass$(), $(item)dirt$() and $(item)sand$(). Mutate this plant from another with $(item)Mutandis$().

Emits an unearthly glow that illuminates it's surround. It can live anywhere, but spreads only on $(item)grass$(), $(item)dirt$() and $(item)sand$(). Mutate this plant from another with $(item)Mutandis$().
It's parsnip-shaped root has the look of a man. Harvest at night, lest it waken and scream. It grows in tilled earth in stages. Tall grass yields seeds.
A curious plant, cold as the snow, freezes moisture as it grows. It grows in tilled earth in stages. Tall grass yields seeds.
A creeper-like moss that grows best on trees, forms the best poppets that can be. Harvest with shears to keet it intact. Mutate this plant from another with $(item)Mutandis$().
This thorny bramble spreads around, when you try to pull it down. Mutate this plant from $(item)cactus$() and $(item)spanish moss$().
This strange bramble keeps creatures at bay; for when they get close it teleports them away. Mutate this plant from $(item)sugar cane$() and $(item)spanish moss$().
This strange bramble keeps creatures at bay; for when they get close it teleports them away. Created and fueled with magic no rituals will function near to it.
A water-bred plant with strange effect, fills the belly then empties it. It grows on still water in stages. Tall grass yields seeds.
A curious plant that holds whatever it is given. Mutate this plant from tall grass and an empty chest.
Small creatures are this plants' prey, it snaps them up - never to get away. Mutate this plant from $(l:herbology/herbology#alder)alder saplings$(), a $(item)web$() and a $(item)zombie$().
In a witches garden keep in mind, a scratch from this rose leaves your blood behind. Mutate this plant from $(item)poppies$() and a $(l:artifacts/traps/leech_chest)leech chest$(/l).
A make-believe plant that only grows, in the deepest of sleep, where one dreams go.

pages.description: Disturbed cotton is obtained by harvesting $(l:herbology/herbology#wispy_cotton)Wispy Cotton$(/l) in the $(l:dimensions/spirit_world)Spirit World$(/l) when one or more players are experiencing nightmares. This cotton can be spun into $(l:)Tormented Twine$(/l) in the $(l:)Spinning Wheel$(/l), and cannot be replanted.
pages._comment: Unlocked when the player enters the Spirit World

pages.text: Its name is the clue, the werewolf's secret it does undo. It grows in tilled earth in stages. Tall grass yields seeds.
A flavor for food at day, at night it keeps vampires away. It grows in tilled earth in stages. Tall grass yields seeds.
The alder wood appears to bleed when cut, this tree brings misfortune to all. Mutate the sapling from another plant with $(item)Mutandis$().
Hawthorn is the tree of purity, it has long history in the field of herbalism. Mutate the sapling from another plant with $(item)Mutandis$().
The rowan, or mountain-ash has an affinity with mgic other trees seldom match. Mutate this plant from another with $(item)Mutandis$().

Grows in a tall plant on tilled earth. The plant is renewable, but initially it must be $(l:mutations/wormwood_seeds)mutated$(/l) from $(item)Wheat$() and $(l:herbology/herbology#wispy_cotton)Wispy Cotton$(/l).

The insane result of $(l:mutations/mindrake)mutating$(/l) a creeper and a $(l:creatures/mandrake)Mandrake$(/l) together. A Minedrake Bulb dropped on the ground will spawn a Minedrake after a few seconds. Bulbs can also be planted in $(item)Farmland$(), but grow slower than most crops.
